speaker: Requiem
lines: The draft becomes a corridor becomes a choir.
Not voicesâ€”breaths. All the breaths that stopped here, gathered into a single kindness.
You walk where feet do not go and stand where standing is a kind of listening.
The graves above rearrange themselves in your memory into the shape of a door.
When it opens, nothing leaves. When it closes, nothing is trapped.
A ribbon of un-ink writes across your palm: a sigil for letting endings end.
A lantern goes out somewhere you will never find, and you are glad for it.
You turn back toward the world with a song that makes silence feel finished.

give_item.name: Requiem
give_item.description: A rite that lays the restless and quiets the cruel
